doc.headline: Red Cross World Wide Conspiracy
doc.post: Ever notice that they are always around when there is a disaster? They must have something to do with it, it's a conspiracy!

post.author: goldcatt
post.quote: Ever notice that they are always around when there is a disaster? They must have something to do with it, it's a conspiracy!

doc.post:
Ever notice that they are always around when there is a disaster? They must have something to do with it, it's a conspiracy!
Yup it's a conspiracy! A c-o-n.......spiracy.

Why do all conspiracies have to be something bad?
American Red Cross: Donate Now
come on, you know you should
A picture clearly showing that the red cross conspiracy is in Haiti, notice the insignia on the woman's vest.
I just sent them $50 this morning.
Now there's a conspiracy theory I've been a contributor to for about 35 years or so.
Text "haiti" to 90999 to automatically give $10 to Red Cross Haiti Relief Fund, or go to redcross.org to donate.
